00074 VitreReactor::VitreReactor(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg)
00075   :TeleoReactor(arg),
00076    m_host(parse_attr<std::string>("127.0.0.1", // put IP instead of localhost to avoid DNS issues
00077                                   TeleoReactor::xml_factory::node(arg),
00078                                   "addr")),
00079    m_port(parse_attr<std::string>(TeleoReactor::xml_factory::node(arg),
00080                                   "port")),

00090 void VitreReactor::handleInit() {
00091   boost::asio::ip::tcp::resolver resolver(get_io_service());
00092   boost::asio::ip::tcp::resolver::query 
00093     query(boost::asio::ip::tcp::v4(), m_host, m_port);
00094   boost::asio::ip::tcp::resolver::iterator 
00095     iterator = resolver.resolve(query),end;
00096   boost::system::error_code error = boost::asio::error::host_not_found;
00097 
00098   while (error && iterator != end) {
00099     m_socket.close();
00100     m_socket.connect(*iterator++, error);
00101   }
00102   if ( !error )
00103     syslog()<<"Connection to "<<m_host<<':'<<m_port<<" succeeded.";
00104 }

00106 void VitreReactor::send(std::string const &str) {
00107   uint32_t msg_len = htonl(str.length());
00108   boost::array<boost::asio::const_buffer, 2> msg = {
00109       {boost::asio::buffer(&msg_len, sizeof(msg_len)),
00110       boost::asio::buffer(str)} };
00111   try {
00112     m_socket.send(msg);
00113   } catch( std::exception &e) {
00114     syslog()<<" message failure : "<<e.what();
00115     m_socket.close();
00116   }
00117 }

00120 void VitreReactor::handleTickStart() {
00121   if( !m_socket.is_open() ) {
00122     handleInit();
00123   }

00126 void VitreReactor::notify(Observation const &obs) {
00127   if( m_socket.is_open() ) {
00128     std::ostringstream oss;
00129     oss<<"<Token tick=\""<<getCurrentTick()<<"\" on=\""
00130        <<obs.object()<<"\" pred=\""<<obs.predicate()<<"\">"
00131        <<obs<<"</Token>";
00132     send(oss.str());
00133   }
00134 }

00136 bool VitreReactor::synchronize() {
00137   if( m_socket.is_open() ) {
00138     std::ostringstream oss;
00139     oss<<"<Tick value=\""<<(getCurrentTick()+1)<<"\"/>";
00140     send(oss.str());
00141   }
00142   return true;
00143 }
